channel.title: Need help with site im making: content wont margin :(
channel.description:
OK I uploaded the site this time now: http://thugscape.freehostia.com/index.html I know I can't provide much (my new hoster is away so I cant set site up atm), but here is the code -- for some strange reason my #content{} wont margin from the left for my info to be neat: [center][tt]oooooooooooooooooo[/tt] [url=http://go_to_html]HTML Code[/url] [url=http://go_to_css]CSS Code[/url] [tt]oooooooooooooooooo[/tt][/center] [iurl=#html]HTML CODE:[/iurl] [code=html4strict] ThugzPKScape - Massive online RuneScape server by TJ & Shane
 
  • Home
  • Play Now
  • Account
  • Game Guide
  • Community
  • Help
  • Login
Create A Account

Click Here!

Website Feature
Search ThugzPKscape.co.cc
Help the community

Want to help keep this server up and running at its best? >> Read On!

Check out all the shops ingame... >> Read On!

Vote for the next updates!

Vote each month to help make the server better. >> Read On!

Play Now To Meet New People Around The World

CLICK HERE TO PLAY!

Featured News
Grand Opening

Woohooooo! Its the very moment that you've been waiting for a long time now, and you finally did it! You can finally get your game on by creating your very own account with our sign up system...

>> Read On!
Recent News
Server-Unknown.Net Progress

Server-Unknown.Net has not yet been released to public yet, so please ignore the featured news.

>> Read On!

[/code] [iurl=#css]CSS CODE:[/iurl] [code=css] HTML, Body { background: #000000 url(http://i42.tinypic.com/10xcxgm.png) no-repeat fixed; color: #333333; font-family: "Helvetica"; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; } #container { width: 800px; margin: auto; } .artrm { float: right; } #header { background: url(http://i40.tinypic.com/t5ra4h.png) no-repeat; height: 79px; position: relative; top: 15px; } #header h1 { padding: 0; margin: 0; font-size: 38px; color: #ffffff; } #header h1:first-letter { color: #ff9c00; } #header h1 .highlight3 { color: #ff9c00; } #header h2 { color: #ffffff; margin: 0; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 20px; } #navigation { background: url(http://i43.tinypic.com/iqh4w9.png) no-repeat; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; } #navigation #navib { background: url(http://i39.tinypic.com/104q938.png) #FAC833; padding: 2px; } #navigation ul { text-align: center; text-decoration: none; margin: 5px; padding: 5px 0; } #navigation ul li { display: inline; } #navigation ul li a { text-decoration: none; color: #000000; padding: 2px 26px; margin: 0 0; } #navigation ul li a:hover { color: #ffeebb; background: url(http://i39.tinypic.com/2qi4sxd.png) #fff repeat-x; } #sidecont { float: left; width: 295px; } #createacc { background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; color: #ffffff; } #createacc #crtitle { background: #050505; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px; padding-left: 20px; color: #ff9c00; } #createacc h3 { margin: 0; padding: 5px; font-size: 28px; text-align: center; } #createacc h3 a { text-decoration: none; color: #F20000; } #webft { margin-top: 5px; background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; } #wbfttitle { background: #050505; padding: 5px; font-size: 18px; color: #ffffff; padding: 1px 0; padding-left: 20px; } #wbft5pad { padding: 5px; } #searchbox { background: #000000; border: #333333 1px solid; height: 18px; color: #333333; } #searchbox:hover { color: #ff9c00; } #gosearch { background: #050505; border: #333333 1px solid; color: #ff9c00; padding: 0 2px; } #searcheng { color: #ffffff; font-size: 12px; } #searchcont { border: #333333 1px solid; margin-left: 64px; height: 60px; } #searchcont #scont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; } #searchcont form { margin: 0 0; padding: 0; text-align: center; position: relative; top: 8px; } #searchpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; } #donate { margin-top: 6px; } #donate #dcont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; } #donate p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; } #donatecont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; } #donatepic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; } #ingshop { margin-top: 6px; } #ingshop #icont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; } #ingshop p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; } #ingcont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; } #ingpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; } #latestpoll { margin-top: 6px; } #latestpoll #pcont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; } #latestpoll p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; } #pollcont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; } #pollpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }` #content { margin-left: 300px; margin-top: 5px; background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; } #footer { clear: both; font-size: 12px; text-align: justify; } #footer #flogo { float: right; width: 100px; } #footer #ftitle { color: #ffffff; text-align: right; font-size: 18px; text-decoration: none; } #footer #ftitle .crsym { font-size: 9px; position: relative; bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; } #footer #fslogan { color: #ff9c00; text-align: right; text-decoration: none; } #footer p { padding-right: 60px; } [/code][flash=200,200]http://[/flash][flash=200,200][/flash]

item.title: Need help with site im making: content wont margin :(
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“Server-Unknown.Net, post:1, topic:251653”][iurl=#css]CSS CODE:[/iurl]

[code=css]
HTML, Body { background: #000000 url(http://i42.tinypic.com/10xcxgm.png) no-repeat fixed; color: #333333; font-family: “Helvetica”; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
#container { width: 800px; margin: auto; }
.artrm { float: right; }
#header { background: url(http://i40.tinypic.com/t5ra4h.png) no-repeat; height: 79px; position: relative; top: 15px; }
#header h1 { padding: 0; margin: 0; font-size: 38px; color: #ffffff; }
#header h1:first-letter { color: #ff9c00; }
#header h1 .highlight3 { color: #ff9c00; }
#header h2 { color: #ffffff; margin: 0; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 20px; }
#navigation { background: url(http://i43.tinypic.com/iqh4w9.png) no-repeat; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; }
#navigation #navib { background: url(http://i39.tinypic.com/104q938.png) #FAC833; padding: 2px; }
#navigation ul { text-align: center; text-decoration: none; margin: 5px; padding: 5px 0; }
#navigation ul li { display: inline; }
#navigation ul li a { text-decoration: none; color: #000000; padding: 2px 26px; margin: 0 0; }
#navigation ul li a:hover { color: #ffeebb; background: url(http://i39.tinypic.com/2qi4sxd.png) #fff repeat-x; }
#sidecont { float: left; width: 295px; }
#createacc { background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; color: #ffffff; }
#createacc #crtitle { background: #050505; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px; padding-left: 20px; color: #ff9c00; }
#createacc h3 { margin: 0; padding: 5px; font-size: 28px; text-align: center; }
#createacc h3 a { text-decoration: none; color: #F20000; }
#webft { margin-top: 5px; background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; }
#wbfttitle { background: #050505; padding: 5px; font-size: 18px; color: #ffffff; padding: 1px 0; padding-left: 20px; }
#wbft5pad { padding: 5px; }
#searchbox { background: #000000; border: #333333 1px solid; height: 18px; color: #333333; }
#searchbox:hover { color: #ff9c00; }
#gosearch { background: #050505; border: #333333 1px solid; color: #ff9c00; padding: 0 2px; }
#searcheng { color: #ffffff; font-size: 12px; }
#searchcont { border: #333333 1px solid; margin-left: 64px; height: 60px; }
#searchcont #scont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#searchcont form { margin: 0 0; padding: 0; text-align: center; position: relative; top: 8px; }
#searchpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }
#donate { margin-top: 6px; }
#donate #dcont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#donate p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; }
#donatecont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; }
#donatepic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }
#ingshop { margin-top: 6px; }
#ingshop #icont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#ingshop p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; }
#ingcont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; }
#ingpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }
#latestpoll { margin-top: 6px; }
#latestpoll #pcont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#latestpoll p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; }
#pollcont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; }
#pollpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }

#content { margin-left: 300px; margin-top: 5px; background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; }

#footer { clear: both; font-size: 12px; text-align: justify; }
#footer #flogo { float: right; width: 100px; }
#footer #ftitle { color: #ffffff; text-align: right; font-size: 18px; text-decoration: none; }
#footer #ftitle .crsym { font-size: 9px; position: relative; bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; }
#footer #fslogan { color: #ff9c00; text-align: right; text-decoration: none; }
#footer p { padding-right: 60px; }
[/code][/quote]
try that

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with site im making: content wont margin :(
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

OK I uploaded the site this time now:
http://thugscape.freehostia.com/index.html

I know I can’t provide much (my new hoster is away so I cant set site up atm), but here is the code – for some strange reason my #content{} wont margin from the left for my info to be neat:

[center][tt]oooooooooooooooooo[/tt]
HTML Code
CSS Code
[tt]oooooooooooooooooo[/tt][/center]

[iurl=#html]HTML CODE:[/iurl]

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
	<head>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
		<title> ThugzPKScape - Massive online RuneScape server by TJ & Shane</title>
		<link rel="shortcut icon" href="#"/>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/home/basic1.css" type="text/css"/>
	</head>
	<body>
		<div id="container">
			<div id="header">   </div>
			
			<div id="navigation">
				<ul>
				<div id="navib">
					<li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Play Now</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Account</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Game Guide</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Community</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Help</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Login</a></li>
				</div>
				</ul>
			</div>

			<div id="sidecont">
				<div id="createacc">
					<div id="crtitle">Create A Account</div>
						<h3><a href="#" onload="fade()">Click Here!</a></h3>
				</div>

				<div id="webft">
				<div id="wbfttitle">Website Feature</div>
				<div id="wbft5pad">
					<div id="searcheng">
						<div id="searchpic">
							<img src="img/fp/featured/search.png" alt="Search Engine" width="57" height="57">
						</div>
						
						<div id="searchcont">
							<div id="scont">Search ThugzPKscape.co.cc</div>
							<script type="text/javascript">								
									function Src(newtxtsrc,oldtxtsrc) {
											 if(oldtxtsrc.value == newtxtsrc) {
											 			oldtxtsrc.value = '';
											 }
									}
							</script>
							<script type="text/javascript">
									function Srcsite(){
									}
							</script>
							<form>
								<input type="textfield" name="surch" value="Search here..." name="engine" onclick="Src('Search here...',this)" id="searchbox"/>
								<input type="submit" value="GO" id="gosearch"/>
							</form>
						</div>
					</div>
					
					<div id="donate">
						<div id="donatepic">
							<img alt="Donation" width="57" height="57" src="#">
						</div>
						
						<div id="donatecont">
							<div id="dcont">Help the community</div>
								<p>Want to help keep this server up and running at its best? <a href="#">>> Read On!</a></p>
						</div>
					</div>
					
					<div id="ingshop">
						<div id="ingpic" alt="Ingame Shops">
							<img alt="Ingame Shops" width="57" height="57" src="#">
						</div>
						
						<div id="ingcont">
							<div id="icont">Ingame Shops</div>
								<p>Check out all the shops ingame... <a href="#">>> Read On!</a></p>
						</div>
					</div>
					
					<div id="latestpoll">
						<div id="pollpic">
							<img alt="Vote on monthly polls!" width="57" height="57" src="#">
						</div>
						
						<div id="pollcont">
							<div id="pcont">Vote for the next updates!</div>
								<p>Vote each month to help make the server better. <a href="#">>> Read On!</a></p>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div id="content">
				<div id="dlclient">
					<div id="dltitle">Play Now To Meet New People Around The World</div>
						<h3>CLICK HERE TO PLAY!</h3>
				</div>

					<div id="newscont">
						<div id="ftcont">
							<div id="newsft">Featured News</div>
								<div class="newstitle">	Grand Opening	</div>
								<p>Woohooooo! Its the very moment that you've been waiting for a long time now, and you finally did it! You can finally get your game on by creating your very own account with our sign up system...</p>
								<span class="artrm"><a href="#">>> Read On!</a></span>
						</div>
						
						<div id="newscont">
							<div id="newsft">Recent News</div>
								<div class="newstitle">	Server-Unknown.Net Progress	</div>
								<p>Server-Unknown.Net has not yet been released to public yet, so please ignore the featured news.</p>
								<span class="artrm"><a href="#">>> Read On!</a></span>
						</div>
						
						<div id="newsxtra">
							<div id="newsft">More New</div>
							<div id="newsorg">
								<table border="0">
									<tr>
									<td class="moretitle">WTF a news title needed</td>
									<td class="morelink"><a href="#">Read on...</a></td>
									<td class="moredate">09~Dec~2008</td>
									</tr>

									<tr>
									<td class="moretitle">WTF a news title needed</td>
									<td class="morelink"><a href="#">Read on...</a></td>
									<td class="moredate">09~Dec~2008</td>
									</tr>

									<tr>
									<td class="moretitle">WTF a news title needed</td>
									<td class="morelink"><a href="#">Read on...</a></td>
									<td class="moredate">09~Dec~2008</td>
									</tr>
								</table>
							</div>
							<div id="archive">
								<p>Browse our news archive</p>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
			</div>

			<div id="footer">
				<div id="flogo">
					<a href="#">
					<div id="ftitle"><span class="crsym">©</span>SU</div>
					<div id="fslogan">Evolution</div>
					</a>
				</div>
				
				<p>This website and its contents are copyright © 2008 - 2009 <a href="#">Server-Unknown.Net</a>. <br />Use of this website is subject to our <a href="#">Terms & Conditions</a> and <a href="#">Privacy Prolicy</a>. <br />The ability to play and make this game was provided by the <a href="#">server engineers</a>, <a href="#">RuneScape</a>, and the <a href="#">MoparScape Community</a>(other sister sites too).</p>
			</div>
		</div>
	</body>
</html>

[iurl=#css]CSS CODE:[/iurl]

[code=css]
HTML, Body { background: #000000 url(http://i42.tinypic.com/10xcxgm.png) no-repeat fixed; color: #333333; font-family: “Helvetica”; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
#container { width: 800px; margin: auto; }
.artrm { float: right; }
#header { background: url(http://i40.tinypic.com/t5ra4h.png) no-repeat; height: 79px; position: relative; top: 15px; }
#header h1 { padding: 0; margin: 0; font-size: 38px; color: #ffffff; }
#header h1:first-letter { color: #ff9c00; }
#header h1 .highlight3 { color: #ff9c00; }
#header h2 { color: #ffffff; margin: 0; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 20px; }
#navigation { background: url(http://i43.tinypic.com/iqh4w9.png) no-repeat; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; }
#navigation #navib { background: url(http://i39.tinypic.com/104q938.png) #FAC833; padding: 2px; }
#navigation ul { text-align: center; text-decoration: none; margin: 5px; padding: 5px 0; }
#navigation ul li { display: inline; }
#navigation ul li a { text-decoration: none; color: #000000; padding: 2px 26px; margin: 0 0; }
#navigation ul li a:hover { color: #ffeebb; background: url(http://i39.tinypic.com/2qi4sxd.png) #fff repeat-x; }
#sidecont { float: left; width: 295px; }
#createacc { background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; color: #ffffff; }
#createacc #crtitle { background: #050505; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px; padding-left: 20px; color: #ff9c00; }
#createacc h3 { margin: 0; padding: 5px; font-size: 28px; text-align: center; }
#createacc h3 a { text-decoration: none; color: #F20000; }
#webft { margin-top: 5px; background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; }
#wbfttitle { background: #050505; padding: 5px; font-size: 18px; color: #ffffff; padding: 1px 0; padding-left: 20px; }
#wbft5pad { padding: 5px; }
#searchbox { background: #000000; border: #333333 1px solid; height: 18px; color: #333333; }
#searchbox:hover { color: #ff9c00; }
#gosearch { background: #050505; border: #333333 1px solid; color: #ff9c00; padding: 0 2px; }
#searcheng { color: #ffffff; font-size: 12px; }
#searchcont { border: #333333 1px solid; margin-left: 64px; height: 60px; }
#searchcont #scont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#searchcont form { margin: 0 0; padding: 0; text-align: center; position: relative; top: 8px; }
#searchpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }
#donate { margin-top: 6px; }
#donate #dcont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#donate p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; }
#donatecont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; }
#donatepic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }
#ingshop { margin-top: 6px; }
#ingshop #icont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#ingshop p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; }
#ingcont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; }
#ingpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }
#latestpoll { margin-top: 6px; }
#latestpoll #pcont { padding: 2px 0; background: #050505; font-size: 14px; color: #333333; padding-left: 10px; }
#latestpoll p { margin: 0; padding: 4px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; }
#pollcont { margin-left: 64px; border: #333333 1px solid; }
#pollpic { float: left; border: #333333 1px solid; margin-right: 5px; }`

#content { margin-left: 300px; margin-top: 5px; background: #080808; border: #1A1A1A 1px solid; }

#footer { clear: both; font-size: 12px; text-align: justify; }
#footer #flogo { float: right; width: 100px; }
#footer #ftitle { color: #ffffff; text-align: right; font-size: 18px; text-decoration: none; }
#footer #ftitle .crsym { font-size: 9px; position: relative; bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; }
#footer #fslogan { color: #ff9c00; text-align: right; text-decoration: none; }
#footer p { padding-right: 60px; }
[/code][flash=200,200]http://[/flash][flash=200,200][/flash]

item.source: Need help with site im making: content wont margin :(
